Bawa Wanita Cantik ke Kokpit Pesawat, Pilot Dihukum Berat
07 Nov 2019, 06:40 by Putu Intan Raka Cinti


Foto viral wanita cantik yang dibawa masuk pilot tanpa izin ke dalam kokpit. (Foto: Dok. Weibo)

Jakarta - Seorang pilot kedapatan membawa masuk seorang wanita ke dalam kokpit pesawat tanpa izin. Pilot tersebut akhirnya harus rela dihukum berat.Melansir South China Morning Post, pilot itu kini dilarang terbang seumur hidup oleh Air Guilin yang merupakan maskapai penerbangan tempatnya bekerja.Larangan terbang ini dikemukakan secara resmi oleh pihak maskapai China tersebut pada awal pekan ini. Pilot itu dinilai telah melakukan pelanggaran prosedur dan aturan keamanan penerbangan."Air Guilin selalu mementingkan keselamatan penumpang, dan kami tidak mentolerir setiap tindakan yang tidak pantas dan tidak profesional yang dapat membahayakan keselamatan penerbangan," kata pihak maskapai.Kejadian itu sendiri sebenarnya terjadi pada 4 Januari dalam penerbangan dari Guilin ke Yangzhou, Provinsi Jiangsu. Akan tetapi hal itu baru terkuak usai foto perempuan ini viral di situs Weibo.Dalam foto tersebut terlihat seorang wanita muda yang tengah duduk di kokpit sembari berpose dengan jari 'V', ditemani seperangkat alat minum teh. Foto ini disertai tulisan, "Terima kasih banyak, Kapten. Saya sangat senang."Foto ini viral usai seorang blogger mengunggah tangkapan layar foto asli si wanita yang belakangan diketahui bernama Chen Yujing. Ia merupakan mahasiswa tahun ketiga dari Universitas Pariwisata Gulin yang punya cita-cita menjadi pramugari usai lulus kuliah.Menurut South China Morning Post, peraturan penerbangan sipil China hanya mengizinkan penumpang berada di kokpit jika dalam keadaan darurat dan berkaitan dengan keselamatan penerbangan.Akibat kejadian ini, tak hanya pilot yang mendapatkan sanksi. Awak kabin lain yang ikut serta dalam penerbangan pada saat kejadian juga ditangguhkan pekerjaannya tanpa batas waktu, sembari menunggu penyelidikan lebih lanjut.Simak Video "Martha & Vanda, Dua Pilot Perempuan Pertama dari Papua"[Gambas:Video 20detik](krs/wsw)

Bring Beautiful Women to the Aircraft Cockpit, Pilots Severely Sentenced
Nov 7 2019, 06:40 by Putu Intan Raka Cinti


Viral photo of a beautiful woman who was brought into the pilot without permission into the cockpit. (Photo: Doc. Weibo)

Jakarta - A pilot was found to bring a woman into the cockpit without permission. The pilot must finally be willing to be severely punished. Launching the South China Morning Post, the pilot is now banned from flying for life by Air Guilin, which is the airline where he works. The flying ban was officially raised by the Chinese airline earlier this week. The pilot was considered to have violated the procedures and rules of aviation security. "Air Guilin has always been concerned with the safety of passengers, and we do not tolerate any inappropriate and unprofessional actions that can jeopardize flight safety," the airline said. The incident itself actually occurred at 4 January on a flight from Guilin to Yangzhou, Jiangsu Province. However, it was only revealed after this viral photo of the woman on the Weibo website. In the photo seen a young woman who was sitting in the cockpit while posing with the finger 'V', accompanied by a set of tea equipment. This photo is accompanied by the words, "Thank you very much, Captain. I am very happy." This photo was viral after a blogger uploaded a screenshot of the original photo of the woman who was later known as Chen Yujing. He is a third-year student from Gulin Tourism University who aspires to become a flight attendant after graduating from college. According to the South China Morning Post, Chinese civil aviation regulations only allow passengers to be in the cockpit if it is an emergency and is related to flight safety. As a result of this incident, not only pilots get sanctions. Other cabin crew who participated in the flight at the time of the incident were also suspended their work indefinitely, while awaiting further investigation.
